attributes.action: replace 'God Save Our Queen' with 'Blame it on the Weatherman' by B*Witched
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: God Save the Queen is a tired, turgid anthem. It needs to be replaced and what better song sums up the national character than 'Blame it on the Weatherman' by B*Witched?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
